page.description: Deletes files from a directory. If a filter is specified, only files that match the filter are deleted. If a 'keep list' is specified, files in the list are not deleted, even if they match the filter.

argument.name: dirPath
argument.description: The URL of the directory containing the files. The directory name must end in a forward slash '/'.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: A regular expression used to filter the files.

argument.name: keepList
argument.description: An array of filenames to keep. Any files found in this list, even if they match the filter, will not be deleted.

argument.name: onSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function called if the call is successful.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs.
